name: Verdito's Soup
description:
This game is part of  #paintjam 2021 by Yukon W.

Theme: Campbell's Soup!

CHALLENGES:

  • Only use the default MS Paint color palette.
  • Use only comic sans for any in-game font.
  • Draw your assets without a drawing tablet.
  • Only use the pencil tool.

Verdito has been left alone in his house, his family said they were going to be back soon, but Verdito his huuungry... What will he do in this dilema?

CONTROLS
MOUSE - Interact.

Why did I let my friends decide the genre?
Why did I make this at all? :,)
